NonPalindromicalPCE¶

public class NonPalindromicalPCE¶

Created by jeremy on 6/22/16.

Methods¶

computeNonPalindromicERO¶

public Map<String, List<TopoEdge>> computeNonPalindromicERO(RequestedVlanPipeE requestPipe, List<ReservedBandwidthE> rsvBwList, List<ReservedVlanE> rsvVlanList)¶

Depends on DijkstraPCE and ServiceLayerTopology to construct and build the Service-Layer EROs, and then map them to Physical-Layer EROs

Parameters:
  • requestPipe – Requested pipe with required reservation parameters
Throws:
  • PCEException –
Returns:

A two-element Map containing both the forward-direction (A->Z) ERO and the reverse-direction (Z->A) ERO
